description: This lightly curried root vegetable soup is delicious with a bit of sweetness from the apples.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Seafood free,Fresh ingredients,Wheat free,Apple,Comfort food,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free
name: Carrot, Parsnip & Apple Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L vegetable stock, made with 2 stock cubes
2 tbs creme fraiche, reduced fat (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pot on medium heat and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and curry powder and cook for 1 minute. Tip in the chopped apple, parsnip and carrot and cook for 2 minutes, stirring well to coat with the curry mix.
Pour over the vegetable stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Remove from the heat and blend until smooth with an immersion blender. Serve with creme fraiche swirled on top.
